info.name: Mobile Banking API
info.description:
This is a sample API simulating how a mobile banking application might interact with the banking services.

Contact Support:
 Email: solutions@postman.com

variable.description: (Required) ID of the account to return

response.name: Returns the account referenced by the ID

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: oauth2

variable.description: (Required) ID of the account to return

 "created": "2021-07-21T17:32:28Z"
}

{
 "name": "Everyday Savings Account",
 "type": "SAVINGS",
 "id": "{{$randomUUID}}",

 "balance": 0,
 "created": "{{$randomDatePast}}"
}
